title: Pilot: Part 1
description: Nineteen-year-old Christy Huddleston arrives from Asheville to teach school in the poverty-stricken community of Cutter Gap.

title: Pilot: Part 2
description: Christy becomes better acquainted with Dr. MacNeil and struggles to cope with the discovery of a secret stash hidden beneath the school house.

title: Lost and Found
description: Christy convinces Rob Allen to enter a writing contest, and Little Burl suffers a life-threatening injury.

title: Both Your Houses
description: The death of Opal McHones baby rattles Christy, meanwhile, Opals husband seeks shelter at the mission from angry moonshiners.

title: A Closer Walk
description: Christy meets the cove's oldest dweller Polly Teague; and Rev. David runs into trouble with Ault Allen.

title: Judgement Day
description: Dr. Ferrand, director of the Mission, pays a visit to Cutter Gap and assesses the progress being made in the area.

title: Eye of the Storm
description: Dr. MacNeil diagnosis Becky O'Teale with trachoma, and attempt a risky procedure to restore her sight.

title: Amazing Grace
description: Theodore Harland comes to Cutter Gap to record some of the local folk music. With the assistance of John Spencer he records all the songs Miss Hattie knows. A woman accompanying Mr. Harland turns out to be Miss Alice's long lost daughter.

title: The Sweetest Gift
description: As the residents of Cutter Gap prepare for Thanksgiving, Christy's father visits. Meanwhile, David tries to find a way to bring the new church bell to town on his own.

title: To Have and to Hold
description: Miss Ida's secret pen-pal comes to Cutter Gap seeking her hand in marriage and David proposes to Christy.

title: The Hunt
description: David gets a visit from a childhood friend and Sam Houston hopes that the capture of the Great White Buck will redeem his elderly dog.

title: A Man's Reach
description: Zady Spencer is jealous of the attention Rob Allen begins to get from Christy when he is offered a college scholarship.

title: Ghost Story
description: Christy attempts to teach her students about superstition by taking them on a field trip to a mysterious cave.

title: Echoes
description: Christy accompanies Miss Alice to Freedom, Kentucky to celebrate the birthday of an old friend.

title: The Lie
description: Bessie Coburn becomes jealous of John Spencer's interest in his teacher, Miss Christy Huddleston. A chance encounter between Christy and Dr. MacNeill threatens both their reputations.

title: Green Apples
description: One of Christy's students comes down with Scarlet Fever and the school is placed under quarantine.

title: The Hostage
description: When Jarvis Tatum's wife dies he holds Dr. MacNeill responsible. When Christy and Rev. Grantland become involved David is shot and Christy is held captive.

title: Babe in the Woods
description: The students find a baby just outside the mission.

title: Second Sight
description: Christy is troubled when a benefactor from the city comes to Cutter Gap looking to purchase land for his lumber mill.

title: The Road Home
description: Christy is distressed by the actions of the men of the Cove and is torn between her affections for Dr. MacNeil and David.
